metadata.title: For Suppliers - Join Event Logic Network
metadata.description: Join thousands of suppliers in Event Logic's network. Get more bookings and grow your business with our event management platform.

hero.title: For Suppliers
hero.subtitle: For those who provide services within events, meetings, and conferences

moreBusiness.title: More Business
moreBusiness.description: Get exposure to thousands of meeting planners and event organizers looking for suppliers.

simplifiedCommunication.title: Simplified Communication
simplifiedCommunication.description: Communicate with clients directly through the platform, with all information in one place.

noUpfrontCosts.title: No Upfront Costs
noUpfrontCosts.description: It's free to be listed in our database. You only pay a small commission when you get a booking.

createProfile.title: 1. Create Your Profile
createProfile.description: Sign up and create a detailed profile showcasing your venue or services, with photos, descriptions, and pricing information.

receiveRequests.title: 2. Receive Quote Requests
receiveRequests.description: Get notified when meeting planners request quotes for events that match your services.

submitQuotes.title: 3. Submit Quotes
submitQuotes.description: Respond to quote requests with detailed offers, including pricing, availability, and any special conditions.

getBookings.title: 4. Get Bookings
getBookings.description: When your quote is accepted, you'll receive a booking confirmation and can start planning the details.

manageEvents.title: 5. Manage Events
manageEvents.description: Use the platform to communicate with clients, access participant information, and manage all aspects of the event.

pricing.title: Supplier Pricing
pricing.subtitle: It's free to join Event Logic as a supplier. You only pay a small commission when you get a booking through the platform.
pricing.description: We charge an 8% commission on the total booking value when you receive a booking through Event Logic.

cta.title: Ready to grow your business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of suppliers who are getting more bookings through Event Logic.
